FuncDef: This command is used to control threshold-based IGP TE updates. Thete-threshold-updatecommand must enable IGP TE update based only on bandwidth reservation thresholds per interface and must block IGP TE update on bandwidth changes for each reservation. Threshold levels can be defined using thete-up-thresholdandte-down-thresholdcommands at the global RSVP or per-interface level.
